about_the_game:
BURN is a psychological horror game set aboard a derelict, gothic space station. As an investigator sent to the convent station St. Maria, you must uncover the fate of its six missing crew members and piece together the unsettling truth lurking within its halls.

Features

  • Zero gravity first person movement - propel yourself through the environment with unique 3 dimensional movement

  • Horror based around building paranoia and a sense of impending doom

  • A short experience intended to last around an hour

  • Immersive UI and systems

  • Environmental storytelling 

Gameplay

Set in the convent station "St. Maria" find the 6 missing crew members and unravel the mystery of the station as danger draws near. Reroute power to each section of the ship and discover what lies waiting.

Accessibility Features

We understand that the zero gravity movement can cause motion sickness in some players, and have added a multitude of settings to combat this, like an FOV slider, a motion blur toggle, and a VR inspired additional vignette.

content_descriptors.notes: This game has depictions of nuns dead in space. The deaths are not shown but the dead people are. Deaths include burning alive, asphyxiation, and suicide.
